channel.title: RageX | What The Community Want | RSPS For Anyone
channel.description:
[CENTER] [b][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4525973/site_logo.png[/img] [URL=http://www.ragex.org/]RageX Home[/URL] [URL=http://www.ragex.org/forum]RageX Forums ( NEW )[/URL] [URL=http://www.ragex.org/highscores]RageX HighScores ( NEW )[/URL] [URL=http://www.ragex.org/RageX_Client.jar]RageX Download[/URL]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZMUaKPjmBY&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
----- [SIZE=14pt]Triple XP for Reopening, Start training now. Mystery Box with Random on Login.[/SIZE] -----
[SIZE=12pt]RageX is a RuneScape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Made by players, for the players. RageX aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it's players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14pt]Features:[/SIZE][/b][SPOILER] Barrows above Mounds Easy Teleporting Bonus XP Weekends/Donators Safe Pvp Zone All Skills but Construction (For Now) Home Set To Yanille High Detailed Client Adjustable Client Settings Point Systems Achievements All Item Equips Fixed Colored Items Many Bosses Skill Tab Clicking Options Freedom for the players Stable Economy A Fresh Start Many more features but you'd have to come and check it out.
[/SPOILER]
[SIZE=14pt][b]Media:[/b][/SIZE][SPOILER] Home Area: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464180/tpHUojO.png[/img] Shortcuts: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464184/dxMljqj.png[/img] Clickable Skill Tab, Brings Up Options: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464186/Fm4cgNs.png[/img] Points Handlers: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464196/UuPQ9Aj.png[/img] Vote for Rewards: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464198/nkxmvNR.png[/img] Custom Objects: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464199/MMaMDnj.png[/img] Stats Restore: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464201/29Mr7Sn.png[/img] Prayer/Curses Switch: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464202/0Bo6vTw.png[/img] Spell Book Switch: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464203/8K5sk9q.png[/img] Customize-able Client: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464204/CoYnDzJ.png[/img] Bossing: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4464205/XHUgHza.png[/img] Pvp Zone(Safe): [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4525999/Screenshot_13.png[/img] Specing: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4525998/CAATCbR.png[/img] Random: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4526002/Screenshot_1.png[/img]
[/SPOILER] [b] RageX isn't very popular. There isn't many players due to just getting the word out. But I look forwards to have a successful private server. Do I want a bunch of players? No, all I am looking for is about 20-50 players. As long as people are enjoying the game, I'm happy.
Hope to see some of you in-game. Thank you for your time, Happy Gaming.[/b][/CENTER]

item.title: RageX | What The Community Want | RSPS For Anyone
item.dc:creator: @RageX_Tyler RageX_Tyler
item.description:
@RageX_Tyler wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:10, topic:549978”]Server media didn’t look to bad, so decided to give it a try.

It’s a neat and decent server, i quite like the NPC drops and over all it’s a fun server. ;D
Though i noticed a few things while playing, which may be an issue for other players as well.

-Character invisible in equipment tab
-Shortcut icon not working in Re-sizeable and Fullscreen
-Hitting and being hit seems to have delay, on showing the dealt damage (Noticed this at Rock crabs)
-Most NPCs that should be aggresive, aren’t 100% aggresive. (They will follow you, but not attack you)
-Prayer orb shows 10x your actual prayer points.
-Hill giants seem to have an loading issue, the first time you visit them. (Went there and they where invisble for like 15 seconds, after that they where visible)
-When climbing up some ladders, you end up at random locations instead of the correct one

That’s about it for now, might find more down the road.
But for sure Rage-x is a server to play for a while, and have fun together with other players.

Pay to win.[/quote]

Thank you for the feedback. Will improve.

HighScore Setup, Link Added
Bug fixes
Commands to open sites
More to come

Read full topic
item.source: RageX | What The Community Want | RSPS For Anyone

item.title: RageX | What The Community Want | RSPS For Anyone
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Server media didn’t look to bad, so decided to give it a try.

It’s a neat and decent server, i quite like the NPC drops and over all it’s a fun server. ;D
Though i noticed a few things while playing, which may be an issue for other players as well.

-Character invisible in equipment tab
-Shortcut icon not working in Re-sizeable and Fullscreen
-Hitting and being hit seems to have delay, on showing the dealt damage (Noticed this at Rock crabs)
-Most NPCs that should be aggresive, aren’t 100% aggresive. (They will follow you, but not attack you)
-Prayer orb shows 10x your actual prayer points.
-Hill giants seem to have an loading issue, the first time you visit them. (Went there and they where invisble for like 15 seconds, after that they where visible)
-When climbing up some ladders, you end up at random locations instead of the correct one

That’s about it for now, might find more down the road.
But for sure Rage-x is a server to play for a while, and have fun together with other players.

Pay to win.

Read full topic
item.source: RageX | What The Community Want | RSPS For Anyone

Made by players, for the players. RageX aims to capture a flawless gameplay
